message: Like the idea, content is solid however it needs to be in realtime example when you go to Television it should show you a realtime EPG of programs and let you rate them while you watching the show on televison. You have a really good concept that can be built on.

@damien121 thanks damien. I couldn't agree more. The real time aspect would be very cool and is definitely something on our radar. We have so many ideas and possibilities with the backend we have established that we're picking and choosing right now what we believe will be the most influential. But in time we hope it will have everything everyone is hoping for (somewhat).
